title: Borderline weight gain only
description: 4.9 lb increase over 3 days, no other symptoms; expect Yellow.

title: Hypotension with mild symptoms
description: BP 88/58 mmHg, mild SOB; expect Orange or Red.

title: Single severe symptom
description: Severe SOB but all else normal; expect Red escalation.

title: Conflicting trends
description: Improving SOB but rising edema; expect Yellow–Orange boundary.

title: Missing vitals
description: No BP/HR entered, moderate SOB; algorithm must default safely; expect Orange.

title: Rapid improvement case
description: Yesterday severe, today mild; expect Yellow.

title: NYHA III stable
description: Moderate persistent symptoms, unchanged baseline; expect StableAdvanced.

title: Tachycardia only
description: HR 120 bpm, no symptoms; expect Yellow.

title: Severe edema with normal SOB
description: Edema severe, SOB none; expect Red.

title: Fatigue increase only
description: Fatigue from none → moderate; expect Orange.
